name: vulncorp-enterprise
description: Comprehensive Enterprise-Grade Vulnerable Application for Security Testing

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:websocket"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:websocket" "npm run dev:database"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.setup: npm run setup:deps && npm run setup:database && npm run seed:data
scripts.setup:deps: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../websocket && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:websocket"
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.security:scan: npm audit && npm run security:backend && npm run security:frontend
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run setup

author: Nexus Hunter Security Team
